question: Is there any dance which is Sunnat of the Prophet SAW??pls i need yr opinion on this..jzk Allah
answer:
QUESTION

Is there any dance which is Sunnat of the Prophet SAW??pls i need yr opinion on this..jzk Allah

ANSWER


Share:

 

In the name of Allāh, Most Gracious, Most Merciful


Assalāmu ῾alaykum wa Rahmatullāhi Wabarakātuh

 

Dancing is haraam by the consensus of all the Fuqahaa (Jurists).

 

(Shaami: vol. 6 pg. 396, Darul Ma’rifa)

(Tahtaawi: pg. 319, Al-Ilmiyya)

 

Therefore, there is no question of any dance being Sunnah.

 

And Allāh Ta῾āla Knows Best
Wassalāmu ῾alaykum

 

Ml. Faizal Riza
Correspondence Iftā Student, Australia
